title: Bug 18934: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: In the ImageAnalyzer example, the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved, but they do not have any effect. When opening a small image, such as an icon, the scrollbars are misleading as they do not perform any function.
EB: The scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example should be disabled when opening small images, such as icons, as they do not provide any useful functionality in this case.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the ImageAnalyzer example.
2. View a small image, such as an icon.
3. Notice that the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved, but have no effect.
